sys_script_include.description: The DataSilosGetRelatedRecords function is called by the DataSilos extension point instance class and returns an array of related records to the given record. If the record does not have any related records the function should return an empty array. If the function returns false, the default DataSilos function or other extensions will provide the related records.
sys_script_include.name: DataSilosGetRelatedRecords
